content:
{"name": "Druid Hills Academy Summer Meal", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Open this summer from 06-16-2025 to 07-31-2025. 
All kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.
Some meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals
Families can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers. Learn more and find out if your child is eligible at ncdhhs.gov/SUNBucks.
The supervisor is Missy Curenton  (tel: (980) 343-3344).  ", "email": "", "url": "https://summermeals4nckids.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2801 Lucena Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Druid Hills North", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2573148, "longitude": -80.8241748}, "phones": [{"number": "(980) 343-3344", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
